services.title: Honda Value Added Services
services.content: Honda offers several value added services to enhance ownership experience. These include Extended Warranty, Extended Warranty Plus, Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC), Road Side Assistance (RSA), EV Care Package, and Know Your Vehicle under the Right to Repair initiative.

services.title: Honda Service Offerings
services.content: Honda provides Recall Campaigns, Honda Genuine Parts, Service Appointments, Booking Cancellation, Finance Availability, Refund Verification, and Value Added Service enquiries.

services.title: Honda Electric Two Wheelers
services.content: Honda electric two wheelers in India include Activa e and QC1 models.

services.title: Honda Scooters
services.content: Honda scooter lineup includes Activa110, Activa110 Anniversary Edition, Dio110, Activa125, Activa125 Anniversary Edition, and Dio125.

services.title: Honda Red Wing Motorcycles
services.content: Honda Red Wing motorcycles include Shine100, Shine100 DX, Livo, Shine125, SP125, SP125 Anniversary Edition, CB125 Hornet, Unicorn, SP160, NX200, and Hornet 2.0.

services.title: Honda BigWing Motorcycles
services.content: Honda BigWing motorcycles include NX200, CB300F, CB350, CB350C, CB350C Special Edition, CB350 H'ness, CB350RS, NX500, CB650R, CBR650R, Hornet 750, XL750 Transalp, X-Adv, Hornet 1000 SP, and GoldWing Tour.

services.title: Honda Dealer Network
services.content: Honda dealer network services include locating dealers, viewing the dealer network, becoming a dealer, and finding distributors across India.

services.title: About Honda India Operations
services.content: Honda India operations include corporate history, manufacturing factories, technology initiatives, racing activities, and career opportunities. Honda is also connected with Honda Global, Honda Cars India, Honda India Power Products, and Honda Power Pack Energy India.

services.title: Honda Sustainability Initiatives
services.content: Honda sustainability initiatives focus on environmental programs at manufacturing plants, End of Life Vehicle handling, safety at Honda plants, safety education in India, and corporate social responsibility activities.

services.title: Honda Resources
services.content: Honda provides resources such as Owner’s Manuals, Video Gallery, Press Releases, Awards, FAQs, Creative Gallery, and Institutional Sales information.

services.title: Honda Customer Support
services.content: Honda customer support is available through dealer locator services, enquiry options, WhatsApp channel, phone support at 1800 103 3434, and email support.

annual maintenance contract.title: Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC)
annual maintenance contract.content: Honda Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC) is a value-added service designed to provide hassle-free vehicle maintenance with protection against inflation. AMC is available for select Honda two-wheelers, including RedWing motorcycles, scooters, BigWing motorcycles, and EV models. Customers can opt for AMC after completion of free services.

annual maintenance contract.title: Types of Honda AMC
annual maintenance contract.content: Honda AMC is available in two types: Premium AMC and Basic AMC. Premium AMC offers long-term maintenance coverage from 1 to 6 years, while Basic AMC provides discounted maintenance coverage for a period of 1 year.

annual maintenance contract.title: Premium Annual Maintenance Contract
annual maintenance contract.content: Premium Annual Maintenance Contract provides comprehensive maintenance benefits with peace of mind. It includes periodic services, periodic maintenance parts, lubricants, washing, and labour. Premium AMC is available for a duration of 1 to 6 years after completion of free services.

annual maintenance contract.title: Premium AMC Customer Benefits
annual maintenance contract.content: Premium AMC benefits include flexibility of purchase, long-term coverage from 2 to 6 years, inclusive coverage of periodic maintenance parts, lubricants and labour, 5% discount on additional parts and lubricants, 20% discount on additional labour, free washing, complimentary pick and drop, doorstep service, free chain cleaning, inflation protection, and improved resale value.

annual maintenance contract.title: Basic Annual Maintenance Contract
annual maintenance contract.content: Basic Annual Maintenance Contract provides essential maintenance benefits for a period of 1 year. It can be purchased after completion of free services and focuses on discounted servicing rather than inclusive coverage.

annual maintenance contract.title: Basic AMC Customer Benefits
annual maintenance contract.content: Basic AMC benefits include flexibility to choose between Basic and Premium AMC, best coverage term of 2 years, 5% discount on parts and lubricants, 20% discount on additional labour, free washing, inflation protection, and improved resale value.

annual maintenance contract.title: Features of Annual Maintenance Contract
annual maintenance contract.content: Key features of Honda AMC include hassle-free maintenance, protection against rising service costs through inflation protection, and improved resale value due to documented and authorised servicing.

annual maintenance contract.title: How to Enrol in Honda AMC
annual maintenance contract.content: Customers can enrol in Honda AMC by visiting their nearest Honda authorised dealership or by registering interest through the Enquire Now option. AMC benefits can be availed only at the authorised service centre from where the AMC has been purchased.

annual maintenance contract.title: AMC Discounts and Coverage
annual maintenance contract.content: Under Premium AMC, customers receive higher discounts on additional parts, lubricants, and labour. Under Basic AMC, customers receive a 5% discount on parts and lubricants and a discount on additional labour. Exact discount percentages may vary by plan and tenure.

annual maintenance contract.title: AMC Applicability and Conditions
annual maintenance contract.content: AMC is available only for select Honda models. Benefits are applicable exclusively at the Honda authorised service centre where the AMC was purchased. Conditions apply, and customers are advised to contact their nearest dealership for detailed eligibility.

annual maintenance ev care.title: EV Care Package Overview
annual maintenance ev care.content: Honda EV Care Package is an after-sales care initiative designed to protect the asset value of Honda electric vehicles. It focuses on world-class maintenance, extended vehicle value, and a superior ownership experience through comprehensive care packages.

annual maintenance ev care.title: Honda Care Package
annual maintenance ev care.content: Every Honda EV customer is entitled to a complimentary Honda Care Package. The package includes three free periodic maintenance services, free roadside assistance for the first year, vehicle warranty of three years or 30,000 kilometers whichever comes earlier, 24x7 dedicated call centre support, and free Software as a Service for connected features for the first year.

annual maintenance ev care.title: Honda Care Plus Package
annual maintenance ev care.content: Honda Care Plus is a comprehensive ownership plan designed to provide enhanced reliability and peace of mind for five years at an affordable price. The package is priced at INR 9900 and offers extended long-term protection for Honda electric vehicles.

annual maintenance ev care.title: Honda Care Plus Package Benefits
annual maintenance ev care.content: Honda Care Plus benefits include a five-year Annual Maintenance Contract consisting of one year standard and four years extended AMC, five-year warranty with three years standard and two years extended coverage, five-year roadside assistance with nationwide validity, and reduced unexpected ownership costs. Each component of the package can also be purchased individually.

annual maintenance ev care.title: AMC Coverage Under Honda Care Plus
annual maintenance ev care.content: The five-year AMC under Honda Care Plus includes three free periodic maintenance services in the first year and eight paid periodic maintenance services over the next four years. Labour charges for the paid services are covered, while customers are required to pay only for consumables and parts.

annual maintenance ev care.title: Applicability and Purchase Conditions
annual maintenance ev care.content: Honda Care Plus package can be purchased at the time of vehicle purchase or within thirty days of vehicle purchase from an authorized EV Honda dealer. The package is transferable to subsequent owners of the same vehicle but is not transferable to another vehicle. Benefits can be availed at any authorized EV Honda dealer across India.

annual maintenance ev care.title: Pricing and Model Coverage
annual maintenance ev care.content: Honda EV Care packages apply to electric models including Activa e and QC1. Standard warranty for these models is three years, with free services and roadside assistance provided during the first year. Honda Care Plus is available as an optional paid package.

annual maintenance ev care.title: EV Care Package FAQs
annual maintenance ev care.content: Frequently asked questions cover Care Plus inclusions, transferability, all-India validity, purchase window of thirty days from vehicle purchase, AMC coverage details, and purchase options through authorized EV Honda dealers with financing availability.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Extended Warranty Overview
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Honda Extended Warranty provides protection against manufacturing defects after the standard warranty period. It helps mitigate high repair or replacement costs for covered parts and enhances long-term ownership peace of mind.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Applicable Vehicle Segments
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Honda Extended Warranty is available for RedWing motorcycles, RedWing scooters, BigWing motorcycles, and electric vehicles. Coverage options and tenure vary by model category and engine capacity.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Extended Warranty Packages for Motorcycles
service maintainance extended warranty.content: For select motorcycles, extended warranty options allow coverage up to 10 years by combining standard warranty with extended tenure options. Warranty validity is based on policy period or kilometre limit, whichever is earlier.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: BigWing Motorcycle Coverage
service maintainance extended warranty.content: BigWing motorcycles such as CB300F, CB350, CB350RS, CB350 H’ness, NX500, GoldWing Tour, and XL750 Transalp are eligible for extended warranty plans with varying tenure and kilometre coverage depending on the model.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Extended Warranty Coverage for EV
service maintainance extended warranty.content: For Honda electric vehicles, extended warranty provides an additional two years or 20,000 kilometres of coverage for both battery and vehicle, subject to terms and conditions.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Features of Extended Warranty
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Key features include extended warranty duration up to 6 years or higher based on plan, flexible product range, flexible buying options, purchase window within a defined period from vehicle purchase, pan-India validity, transferability on ownership change, genuine Honda parts usage, and service by trained Honda technicians.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Benefits of Extended Warranty
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Extended Warranty benefits include complete peace of mind, cost-effective repairs, coverage of high-value parts, improved resale value, longer vehicle life, and consistent service standards across India.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Purchase Window and Eligibility
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Extended Warranty must be purchased within a defined time window from the vehicle purchase date. The exact purchase duration varies by vehicle category, with EV extended warranty available within one year from purchase.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Service and Validity Conditions
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Extended Warranty remains valid only if periodic maintenance services are carried out as scheduled at authorized Honda service centres. Missing scheduled services can result in warranty voidance.

service maintainance extended warranty.title: Extended Warranty FAQs
service maintainance extended warranty.content: Frequently asked questions address coverage scope, purchase eligibility, covered parts, labour charges inclusion, transferability between dealers, pan-India validity, and differences between standard and extended warranty coverage.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Recall Campaign Overview
services maintenance recall campaign.content: Honda conducts proactive recall campaigns as a responsible manufacturer to inspect or replace affected vehicles if any issue is identified in manufactured products. The objective is to ensure customer safety, vehicle reliability, and a premium riding experience.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Purpose of Recall Campaign
services maintenance recall campaign.content: The recall campaign aims to inform customers about affected units, identify suspected issues, outline corrective actions, provide replacement timelines, and address frequently asked questions related to recalls.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Applicable Vehicle Categories
services maintenance recall campaign.content: Recall campaigns may apply to BigWing motorcycles, RedWing motorcycles, RedWing scooters, and Honda electric vehicles. Customers must select the appropriate vehicle category to check recall applicability.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: How to Check Recall Applicability
services maintenance recall campaign.content: To check if a vehicle is under a recall campaign, customers must select the vehicle category and model, enter the 17-digit VIN or chassis number, and submit the request. The recall status of the vehicle is then displayed.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Customer Notification Process
services maintenance recall campaign.content: Honda proactively informs customers about recalls through public press releases. Authorized dealers also notify affected customers through letters, phone calls, emails, or SMS regarding inspection or repair requirements.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: What Customers Should Do
services maintenance recall campaign.content: If a vehicle is identified under a recall, customers should contact their nearest Honda authorized dealership and schedule a service appointment for inspection or replacement.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Cost and Warranty Policy
services maintenance recall campaign.content: All recall inspections and replacements are carried out free of charge, irrespective of the vehicle’s warranty status.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Authorized Service Locations
services maintenance recall campaign.content: All vehicles identified under recall are attended to at Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India authorized dealerships across the country.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Appointment Recommendation
services maintenance recall campaign.content: To avoid inconvenience or waiting time, customers are advised to book a service appointment in advance based on their availability.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Replacement of Suspected Spare Parts
services maintenance recall campaign.content: Honda also replaces all suspected spare parts stock associated with the recall to ensure vehicle safety and maintain high quality standards.

services maintenance recall campaign.title: Recall Campaign FAQs
services maintenance recall campaign.content: Frequently asked questions address how to check recall status, customer actions after recall identification, cost involvement, service locations, appointment scheduling, and replacement of suspected spare parts.

campaign product recall listing.title: Product Recall Listing Overview
campaign product recall listing.content: Honda conducts voluntary product recall campaigns to inspect or replace affected vehicles when quality or safety issues are identified. These campaigns aim to maintain customer safety, product reliability, and trust.

campaign product recall listing.title: CB1000 Hornet SP Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CB1000 Hornet SP is under a voluntary recall due to a potential issue where excessive radiant heat from the exhaust system may soften the painted seating surface, causing the gear shift pedal pivot bolt to loosen or fall off, affecting gear shifting while riding.

campaign product recall listing.title: Africa Twin (CRF1100) ECU Software Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: Africa Twin (CRF1100) is recalled for an ECU software-related issue where unexpected activation of the wheelie control system during acceleration may occur, potentially leading to loss of balance in certain situations.

campaign product recall listing.title: Gold Wing Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: Gold Wing motorcycles are recalled for inspection and replacement related to issues including primary drive gear tightening bolt breakage and inspection or replacement of the fuel pump.

campaign product recall listing.title: CBR1000RR Fuel Pump Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CBR1000RR is recalled due to a potential defect in fuel pump impellers that may have been improperly molded, leading to deformation, fuel pump failure, engine stalling, or failure to start without prior indication.

campaign product recall listing.title: H’ness CB350 Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: H’ness CB350 is recalled for multiple components including rear stop light switch, bank angle sensor, camshaft components, and front and rear wheel speed sensors.

campaign product recall listing.title: CB350RS Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CB350RS is recalled for inspection or replacement of rear stop light switch, bank angle sensor, camshaft components, and front and rear wheel speed sensors.

campaign product recall listing.title: CB300R Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CB300R is recalled for issues related to right crankcase cover replacement and inspection of front and rear wheel speed sensors.

campaign product recall listing.title: CB350 Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CB350 is recalled due to camshaft component issues and front and rear wheel speed sensor inspection or replacement.

campaign product recall listing.title: CB300F Wheel Speed Sensor Recall
campaign product recall listing.content: CB300F is recalled due to potential water seepage into improperly molded wheel speed sensors, which may lead to malfunction of speedometer, traction control, ABS intervention, or reduced braking effectiveness.

campaign product recall listing.title: How to Check Recall Applicability
campaign product recall listing.content: Customers can check recall applicability by selecting their vehicle model and entering the 17-digit VIN or chassis number. Recall status is displayed after submission.

campaign product recall listing.title: Product Recall FAQs
campaign product recall listing.content: FAQs cover how to check recall status, actions to take if a vehicle is recalled, confirmation that recall repairs are free of cost regardless of warranty status, authorized service locations, replacement timelines, and where to find the VIN or chassis number.

road side assistance.title: Road Side Assistance Overview
road side assistance.content: Honda Road Side Assistance (RSA) is a value-added service designed to support customers during unexpected breakdowns such as flat tyres, dead batteries, or vehicle malfunction. RSA provides fast, reliable assistance to ensure rider safety and convenience.

road side assistance.title: Applicable Vehicle Categories
road side assistance.content: Honda RSA is available for RedWing motorcycles, RedWing scooters, BigWing motorcycles, and Honda electric vehicles. Coverage and pricing vary based on engine capacity and model category.

road side assistance.title: RSA Policy Types
road side assistance.content: RSA is offered under different policy categories based on engine capacity: Small Fun for motorcycles up to 500cc, Fun for motorcycles above 500cc with limited towing, and Fun Plus for motorcycles above 500cc with unlimited towing.

road side assistance.title: RSA Pricing
road side assistance.content: RSA pricing includes INR 1999 for motorcycles up to 500cc, INR 3999 for motorcycles above 500cc with limited towing, and INR 7999 for motorcycles above 500cc with unlimited towing. Pricing is for one-year coverage.

road side assistance.title: Core RSA Features
road side assistance.content: Key RSA features include vehicle towing, on-site minor repairs, flat tyre assistance, battery support, key assistance, fuel assistance up to 5 litres per year, taxi assistance up to 50 km, pan-India coverage, and 24x7 phone assistance.

road side assistance.title: Towing Coverage
road side assistance.content: Towing coverage includes up to 300 km for Small Fun and Fun policies, while Fun Plus policies provide unlimited towing distance. Towing is applicable in case the vehicle cannot be repaired on-site.

road side assistance.title: Eligibility Criteria
road side assistance.content: Customers who purchase a new Honda two-wheeler are eligible for RSA up to the seventh year from the vehicle purchase date. RSA can be purchased at the time of vehicle purchase or added later through an authorized Honda dealer.

road side assistance.title: How to Avail RSA
road side assistance.content: To avail Road Side Assistance, customers must call the Honda RSA toll-free number 1800 209 2224. Assistance is available 24x7, and service requests are handled by trained RSA representatives.

road side assistance.title: Usage Limits
road side assistance.content: Customers can avail RSA towing services up to twelve times in a year. Fuel assistance, taxi assistance, and on-site repair services are subject to defined limits per policy year.

road side assistance.title: RSA Services for Electric Vehicles
road side assistance.content: RSA for Honda electric vehicles includes assistance over phone, on-road minor repairs, puncture repair, key assistance, towing to authorized service centres, and pan-India coverage.

road side assistance.title: RSA vs Extended Warranty
road side assistance.content: Road Side Assistance focuses on emergency support during breakdowns, while Extended Warranty covers manufacturing defects and repair costs over an extended period. Both services complement each other for a worry-free ownership experience.

road side assistance.title: Road Side Assistance FAQs
road side assistance.content: FAQs address RSA coverage conditions, eligibility, how to request assistance, service limits, purchase after vehicle delivery, and differences between RSA and extended warranty.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Livo Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Livo is a motorcycle powered by a 109.51cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 6.47 kW at 7500 rpm. It has a 9 litre fuel tank and delivers an estimated mileage of 70 kmpl. Tyres include 80/100-18 at the front and 80/100-18 at the rear. Braking is handled by a 240mm front disc or 130mm drum and a 130mm rear drum with CBS. Suspension consists of telescopic forks at the front and hydraulic type at the rear. Technologies include eSP, PGM-FI, ACG starter, and CBS. Safety features include CBS with equalizer and side stand engine cut-off. Core features include stylish design, digital meter, and alloy wheels. Available colors include Athletic Blue Metallic, Matte Axis Gray, Imperial Red Metallic, and Black. Seat height is 790 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda NX200 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda NX200 is a motorcycle equipped with a 184.4cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 12.5 kW at 8500 rpm. It has a 12 litre fuel tank and offers an estimated mileage of 35 kmpl. Tyres are 110/70-17 at the front and 140/70-17 at the rear. Braking is managed by a 276mm front disc and 220mm rear disc with dual channel ABS. Suspension includes USD forks at the front and a monoshock at the rear. Technology features include Honda RoadSync, HSTC, assist slipper clutch, PGM-FI, TFT display, Bluetooth, navigation, and USB-C charging. Safety features include dual channel ABS, HSTC, and hazard switch. Available colors are Athletic Blue Metallic, Radiant Red Metallic, and Pearl Igneous Black. Seat height is 810 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Shine 100 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Shine 100 is powered by a 100cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 7.38 PS at 7500 rpm. It has a 9 litre fuel tank and an estimated mileage of 55 kmpl. The bike features alloy wheels with sizes not specified. Braking is via a Combi-Brake System with equalizer. Suspension consists of telescopic forks at the front and hydraulic suspension at the rear. Technology includes eSP, PGM-FI, and CBS. Safety features include CBS and side stand engine cut-off. Core features include stylish graphics, long seat, and lightweight frame. Available color options include Blue with Black, Gray with Black, Orange with Black, Red with Black, and Green with Black. Seat height is 786 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Shine 125 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Shine 125 uses a 123.94cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 7.93 kW at 7500 rpm. It has a 10.5 litre fuel tank and offers an estimated mileage of 65 kmpl. Tyres include 80/100-18 at the front and 90/90-18 at the rear. Braking includes a 240mm front disc or 130mm drum and a 130mm rear drum with CBS. Suspension features telescopic forks at the front and hydraulic type at the rear. Technology highlights include eSP, PGM-FI, digital meter, idling stop system, ACG starter, and USB-C charging. Safety features include CBS and side stand engine cut-off. Available colors include Decent Blue Metallic, Pearl Siren Blue, Geny Gray Metallic, Rebel Red Metallic, Pearl Igneous Black, and Matte Axis Gray Metallic. Seat height is 719 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda SP125 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda SP125 is powered by a 123.94cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing approximately 8.24 kW at 7500 rpm. It has an 11 litre fuel tank and an estimated mileage of 63 kmpl. Tyres include 80/100-18 at the front and 100/80-18 at the rear. Braking includes front disc or drum and rear drum with CBS. Suspension consists of telescopic forks at the front and hydraulic type at the rear. Technology features include eSP, PGM-FI, fully digital meter, idling stop system, and USB-C charging. Safety includes CBS with equalizer and engine cut-off. Core features include stylish design, digital console, and alloy wheels. Seat height is 790 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda SP160 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda SP160 features a 162.71cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 9.9 kW at 7500 rpm. It has a 12 litre fuel tank and delivers an estimated mileage of 50 kmpl. Tyres are 80/100-17 at the front and 130/70-17 at the rear. Braking includes a 276mm front disc with rear disc or drum depending on variant, with dual channel ABS on select variants. Suspension includes telescopic forks at the front and a monoshock at the rear. Technology includes eSP, PGM-FI, digital console, USB-C charging, and ABS. Safety features include ABS and engine cut-off. Seat height is 796 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Unicorn Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Unicorn is powered by a 162.7cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 9.5 kW at 7500 rpm. It has a 13 litre fuel tank and offers an estimated mileage of 60 kmpl. Tyres include 80/100-18 at the front and 100/90-18 at the rear. Braking is handled by a 240mm front disc and 130mm rear drum with single channel ABS. Suspension includes telescopic forks at the front and a monoshock at the rear. Technology includes PGM-FI and eSP. Safety features include single channel ABS and engine cut-off. Seat height is 798 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Activa 125 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Activa 125 is a scooter powered by a 123.92cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 6.20 kW at 6500 rpm. It has a 5.3 litre fuel tank and an estimated mileage of 47 kmpl. Tyres include 90/90-12 at the front and 90/100-10 at the rear. Braking consists of a 190mm front disc and 130mm rear drum. Suspension includes telescopic front forks and 3-step adjustable spring-loaded hydraulic suspension at the rear. Technology features include LED headlamp, DC system, smart key, TFT meter, Honda RoadSync, idling stop system, PGM-FI, ACG starter, and USB-C charging. Safety features include side stand engine cut-off and CBS. Seat height is 165 mm.

vehicle specifications.title: Honda Dio 110 Technical Specifications
vehicle specifications.content: Honda Dio 110 is powered by a 109.51cc OBD2B-compliant 4-stroke SI engine producing 5.85 kW at 8000 rpm. It has a 5.3 litre fuel tank and an estimated mileage of 50 kmpl. Tyres include 90/90-12 at the front and 90/100-10 at the rear. Braking consists of 130mm drum brakes at both front and rear. Suspension includes telescopic forks at the front and a unit swing at the rear. Technology features include LED headlamp, TFT meter, idling stop system, USB-C charging, ACG silent start, and PGM-FI. Safety features include side stand engine cut-off and CBS. Available colors include Imperial Red Metallic, Matte Marvel Blue, Matte Axis Gray Metallic, Pearl Igneous Black, and Pearl Deep Ground Gray.
